Verses: 1 yoodhaavin Paavam Irumbezhuththaaniyinaalum, Vairaththin Nuniyinaalum Ezhudhappattu, Avargaludaiya Irudhayaththin Palagaiyilum Ungal Palipeedangaludaiya Kombugalilum Padhindhirukkiradhu.
2 uyarndha Medugalinmel, Pachchaiyaana Marangalandaiyil Irundha Avargaludaiya Palipeedangalaiyum Avargaludaiya Thoppugalaiyum Avargal Pillaigal Ninaikkumpadi Ippadi Seydhirukkiradhu.
3 vayalnilaththilulla En Malaiye, Nee Un Ellaigalilellaam Seydha Paavaththinimiththam Naan Un Aasthiyaiyum, Un Ellaap Pokkishangalaiyum Un Medaigalaiyunkooda Sooraiyiduvippen.

4 appadiye Naan Unakkuk Koduththa Sudhandharaththai Needhaane Vittuviduvaai; Nee Ariyaadha Dhesaththil Unnai Un Saththurukkalukku Adimaiyumaakkuven; Endrendraikkum Eriyaththakka En Kobaththin Akkiniyai Moottivitteergale.
5 manushanmel Nambikkaivaiththu, Maamsamaanadhaith Than Buyapalamaakkikkondu, Karththarai Vittu Vilagugira Irudhayamulla Manushan Sabikkappattavan Endrukarththar Sollugiraar.
6 avan Andharaveliyil Karalaiyaaippona Sediyaippolirundhu, Nanmaivarugiradhaik Kaanaamal, Vanaandharaththin Varatchiyaana Idangalilum, Kudiyillaadha Uvarnilaththilum Thanguvaan.
7 karththarmel Nambikkaivaiththu, Karththaraith Than Nambikkaiyaagak Kondirukkira Manushan Baakkiyavaan.

8 avan Thanneerandaiyile Naattappattadhum Kaalvaai Oramaagath Than Vergalai Vidugiradhum, Ushnam Varugiradhaik Kaanaamal Ilai Pachchaiyaayirukkiradhum, Mazhaiththaazhchchiyaana Varushaththilum Varuththamindrith Thappaamal Kanikodukkiradhumaana Maraththaippoliruppaan.
9 ellaavatraippaarkkilum Irudhayame Thirukkulladhum Magaa Kedulladhumaayirukkiradhu, Adhai Ariyaththakkavan Yaar?

10 karththaraagiya Naane Ovvoruvanukkum, Avanavan Vazhigalukkum Seygaigalin Palangalukkum Thakkadhaik Kodukkumpadikku, Irudhayaththai Aaraaigiravarum Ullindhiriyangalai Sodhiththarigiravarumaayirukkiren.

11 aniyaayamaai Aisuvariyaththai Sambaadhikkiravan Muttaiyittu Avayankaaththum, Kunjuporikkaamar Pogira Kavudhaarikku Samaanamaayirukkiraan; Avan Than Paadhi Vayadhile Adhaivittu, Than Mudivile Moodanaayiruppaan.
12 engal Parisuththa Sthaanam Aadhimudharkondu Uyarndha Magimaiyulla Singaasanamaayirukkiradhu.

13 isravelin Nambikkaiyaagiya Karththaave, Ummaivittu Vilagugira Yaavarum Vetkappaduvaargal; Avargal Jeevanulla Thanneerin Ootraagiya Karththaraivittu Vilagipponapadiyaal, Ummaivittu Agandrupogiravargalin Peyar Puzhudhiyil Ezhudhappadum.
14 karththaave, Ennai Gunamaakkum, Appozhudhu Gunamaaven; Ennai Ratchiyum, Appozhudhu Ratchikkappaduven; Dhevareere En Thudhi.
15 idho, Ivargal Ennaip Paarththu: Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enge? Adhu Ippozhudhu Varattum Engiraargal.

16 naano Ummaip Pinpatrugira Meyppan, Idharku Naan Minji Nadakkavillai; Aabaththunaalai Virumbugiradhumillaiyendru Neer Ariveer; En Udhadugalilirundhu Purappattadhu Umakku Munbaaga Sevvaiyaayirundhadhu.
17 neer Enakku Bayangaramaayiraadheyum, Theengunaalil Neere En Adaikkalam.

18 naan Vetkappadaamal, Ennaith Thunbappaduththugiravargal Vetkappaduvaargalaaga; Naan Kalangaamal Avargal Kalanguvaargalaaga; Dhevareer Theengunaalai Avargalmel Varappanni Rattippaana Norukkudhalaal Avargalai Norukkum.
19 karththar Ennai Nokki: Nee Poi Yoodhaavin Raajaakkal Varaththumpokkumaayirukkira Indha Janangalin Puththirarudaiya Vaasalilum Erusalemin Ellaa Vaasalgalilum Nindrukondu,

20 avargaludane Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Indha Vaasalgalil Pravesikkira Yoodhaavin Raajaakkalum, Ellaa Yoodharum, Erusalemin Ellaak Kudigalumaagiya Neengal Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal.
21 neengal Oivunaalil Sumaigalai Eduththu, Avaigalai Erusalemin Vaasalgalukkul Konduvaraadhapadikkum,

22 oivunaalil Ungal Veedugalilirundhu Sumaiyai Kondupogaadhapadikkum, Oru Velaiyaiyum Seyyaadhapadikkum, Ungal Aaththumaakkalukkaaga Echcharikkaiyaayirundhu, Naan Ungal Pidhaakkalukkuk Kattalaiyittapadi Oivunaalaip Parisuththamaakkungal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
23 avargalo Kelaamalum Thangal Sevigalai Saayaamalum Poi, Kelaadhapadikkum Buththiyai Etrukkollaadhapadikkum, Thangal Kazhuththaik Kadinappaduththinaargal.
24 neengalovenil, Oivunaalil Indha Nagaraththin Vaasalgalukkulle Sumaiyaik Konduvaraadhapadikkum, Oivunaalil Oru Velaiyaiyum Seyyaamal Adhaip Parisuththamaakkumpadikku En Sollaik Ketpeergalaanaal,

25 appozhudhu Dhaaveedhin Singaasanaththil Utkaarndhirukkiravargalum, Radhangalinmelum Kudhiraigalinmelum Erugiravargalumaagiya Raajaakkalum Raajakumaarargalum Avargal Prabukkalum, Yoodhaavin Manusharum, Erusalemin Kudigalum Indha Nagaraththin Vaasalgalukkul Pravesippaargal; Indha Nagaramum Endraikkum Kudiyulladhaayirukkum.

26 yoodhaavin Pattanangalilum, Erusalemin Sutruppuramaana Oorgalilum, Benyameen Dhesaththilum, Pallaththaakkaana Seemaiyilum, Malainaattilum, Therkilumirundhu Janangal Sarvaangthaganangalaiyum Paligalaiyum, Pojanapaligalaiyum Thoobavarkkangalaiyum, Sthoththirapaligalaiyum Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkuk Konduvaruvaargal,

27 neengal Oivunaalaip Parisuththamaakkumpadikkum Oivunaalile Sumaiyai Erusalemin Vaasalgalukkul Eduththuvaraadhirukkumpadikkum, En Sollaikkelaamarponeergalaagil, Naan Adhin Vaasalgalil Theekkoluththuven; Adhu Erusalemin Aramanaigalaip Patchiththum, Avindhupogaadhirukkum Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
